txt.en: <rgb=#00FFFF>A terrible roar heralds the arrival of the drake-matron Celebarch!</rgb>
'Huzzah! The day is ours!'

'Ah, I fear you have wasted your time coming here, [placeholder]. With the way shut, we shall have no problems with the Orcs. Those witless fools have no chance of forcing this door open.\n\n'The Heart of Fire is... wait, what is that sound? It cannot be! They have found us!'
'I do not like this, [placeholder]. Can you hear the rumbling beyond the entrance hall? Come! Follow me!'
<rgb=#FF0000>A crash of stone and a thunderous bellow precede the appearance of the troll Harna</rgb>
'There is little else for you to do here now, [placeholder]. Do you wish to leave with me?'
<rgb=#00FF00>The first assault has been broken. There are a few short moments to rest before the assault continues</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>There is a flash of flame and the fire-grim Fire-heart appears!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>You have defended against the second assault. There are a few short moments to gather your breath before the next arrives</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Stóthkell has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Brogur has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Brogur has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Stóthkell calls out, 'The fires of the eastern forge have died out. Use the bellows to rekindle them!'</rgb>
The Way of Smiths, in which lies the secret entrance to the Heart of Fire, must be defended from the Ghâsh-hai loyal to Mazog.
<rgb=#00FFFF>Stóthkell calls out, 'The fires of the northern forge have died out. Use the bellows to rekindle them!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Stóthkell calls out, 'The fires of the western forge have died out. Use the bellows to rekindle them!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>A horrible stench and awful chittering announce the arrival of the great spider Durbrennil beneath the Supervisor's Platform</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>The beating of wings and the hiss of serpents beneath the Supervisor's Platform speaks of the presence of dragonets....</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>A loud curse in Black Speech from beneath the Supervisor's Platform heralds the Uruk-hai Fikûhom, who claims the Heart of Fire for Saruman</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Sadâuk lets out a gurgling roar as he explodes into the entrance hall</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are moving against the eastern forge!</rgb>
'I would ask that you follow the ebb and flow of the battle and aid where you are needed most.'
'Also, do not forget to unfurl the banners of Khazad-dûm.'
'They can help stir the hearts of all Free Peoples to great deeds and may even help turn the tide of battle.'
'However, do not use them lightly, as once unfurled, a banner's strength is spent.'
'Now dwarves of Moria, we make our stand!'
'Can you feel the tremors? Something is approaching from the south!'
'The Enemy is bringing something powerful to bear against us!'
Talk to Stóthkell in the Way of Smiths
'Prepare yourself! The Enemy is upon us!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are moving against the Supervisor's Platform!</rgb>
Push back the first assault
Push back the second assault
Push back the final assault
Follow Stóthkell
Talk to Stóthkell atop the Supervisor's Platform
Defeat Harna and his keepers
Stóthkell must survive the assault
<rgb=#00FFFF>Shadow-heart has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Fire-heart has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are moving against the western forge!</rgb>
Stóthkell is leading the defence of the Way of Smiths against the forces of Mazog. You should report to him to receive your assignment.
<rgb=#00FFFF>Fikûhom has been defeated</rgb>
The first assault on the Way of Smiths has begun. Protect the forges!
The second assault on the Way of Smiths has begun. Protect the forges!
<rgb=#00FFFF>There is a flash of flame and the fire-grim Shadow-heart appears!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Ice-heart has been defeated</rgb>
The final assault has begun. The enemy's numbers are waning, but their ferocity increases. Withstand this assault, defeat their leader, and maintain control of the Deep-way.
There is a pause in the battle. You should talk to Stóthkell on the Supervisor's Platform.
<rgb=#00FFFF>There is a flash of flame and the frost-grim Ice-heart appears!</rgb>
Harna the troll and his keepers are attacking the entrance hall!
<rgb=#00FFFF>Celebarch has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are moving against the northern forge!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Sadâuk has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Durbrennil has been defeated</rgb>
Skirmish: Battle of the Way of Smiths
